short_summary: Canadian Food Inspection Agency has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to Charlottetown, PE, Atlantic Region by January 23, 2024
description: The tenders are covered by this NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
### Solicitation Number WS4289511062
### Date: November 6, 2023

**Project Background**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure office seating for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) located in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island.

**Solicitation Details**

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4289511062
* **Amendment Date:** November 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 24, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-28 (Pending confirmation of construction schedule)
* **Contract Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Category:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Scope of Work**

This RFP covers the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating, specifically rotary chairs and stools, to the CFIA facility in Charlottetown, PE. The seating requirement will be fulfilled under PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H. 

**Evaluation Criteria**

Proposals will be evaluated based on the Meeting the Requirements, Price, and Business History and Capacity criteria outlined in the RFP documentation.

**Eligibility**

Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid. Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA) holders may submit a bid but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Kristelle LeBlanc at PSPC:
* Email: kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Reference and Use of Agile and Trade Agreements

This RFP is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and has no security implications.

### Cancellation

The Government may cancel any or all of this RFP at its discretion. The Government reserves the right to accept or reject any proposal or proposal component, in whole or in part, and is not bound by any terms and conditions contained in the RFP.

### Responsive Governments

Any unused parts of this RFP will be applied to any or all forward-looking contract opportunities for these government agencies. Agency discharge applicants will respond using supply name and department Public Service National. Department wishes for neutral asset account through procurement manual Oil.
